channel.title: wcf on my tech ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in wcf on my tech ramblings

item.title: Why and how you should add a healthcheck endpoint to your Wcf legacy applications
item.description: What I wanted to talk in these post is how easy is to add a healthcheck endpoint in a WCF application, and how you can use it in case you want to move the application into the Cloud in the near future.
